description: Explanation templates v0 - user-facing explanations for contract risk items

overall_messages.low: No major risk indicators were detected in this contract.
overall_messages.medium: Some contract terms may require your attention.
overall_messages.high: This contract contains terms that should be reviewed carefully.

AUTO_RENEWAL.title: Automatic Renewal
AUTO_RENEWAL.message: This contract may renew automatically unless you take action to cancel it.
AUTO_RENEWAL.user_action: Check the renewal cycle and how to cancel before the renewal date.

LIMITED_NOTICE.title: Limited Prior Notice
LIMITED_NOTICE.message: Some changes or renewals may happen without sufficient advance notice.
LIMITED_NOTICE.user_action: Review how and when notifications are provided.

UNILATERAL_CHANGE.title: Unilateral Changes
UNILATERAL_CHANGE.message: One party may be allowed to change contract terms without your consent.
UNILATERAL_CHANGE.user_action: Pay close attention to clauses about modifications or updates.

EARLY_TERMINATION_PENALTY.title: Early Termination Penalties
EARLY_TERMINATION_PENALTY.message: Ending this contract early may result in penalties or additional fees.
EARLY_TERMINATION_PENALTY.user_action: Check the cost and conditions for early termination.

LIABILITY_LIMITATION.title: Liability Limitations
LIABILITY_LIMITATION.message: The contract limits one partyâ€™s responsibility for damages or losses.
LIABILITY_LIMITATION.user_action: Understand which types of losses may not be covered.

DATA_SHARING.title: Data Sharing
DATA_SHARING.message: Your personal or usage data may be shared with third parties.
DATA_SHARING.user_action: Review what data is shared and who it may be shared with.
